Articles.Content: So I was using Romfarer's buran manipulators to put a wing of solar panels on a space station. I had the two parts pushed together and aligned as best I could. However, when I attempted to weld them I got the message, failure: the parts are too far apart. Since they are pressing against one another as hard as they can I don't know what to make of this. The parts are the aisle module from the large structural parts pack and the large 2.5m battery from KSPX. I wonder if there is something about the collision meshes of these two parts that makes them not want to behave? Any thoughts?
This question would be better asked in the mod's thread, not here.
I was not aware this was a stock only thread. I posted it here because this thread has more traffic and therefore more chances to get an answer. Thanks.
